special_abilities.desc: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
special_abilities.name: Keen Smell

actions.desc: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws
